txt.en: Dúneth can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Dúneth.

'We have made it back safely to Crithost. Tolwin and I shall spend our time vigilantly protecting this village. I am certain that some of the enemy in Cair Andros will retaliate.\n\n'Crithost will stand. You have my word that we will rebuild Talath Anor in time.'

'My son Tolwin and I are bound to this task of defeating those who destroyed our home. My husband and sons will not rest soundly until Korpûrta is defeated.

'[placeholder], you do not need to put yourself in danger as you have no ties to Talath Anor. However, I see it in your eyes that you have done much to help this land and wish to see a better life for all Gondorians.

'Also, I see in Tolwin's eyes that he looks up to you. Should you accept this final attack, you will give Tolwin the strength he needs to face the man who killed his father and kin.'
Dúneth can be found just outside Jal Kepir in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should speak with Dúneth.
'I will not mourn the loss of my husband Gilgír and my sons until The First Blade falls.'
The fearsome Sûhalar, Korpûrta, must face the consequences of his actions for the slaughter of Gilgír and Tolwin's older brothers.
